remarks: The join of two different lattice planes in a (3-dimensional) lattice volume equals the volume.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Jul-2012.)
statement:
2lplnj.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
2lplnj.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
2lplnj.p $e |- P = ( LPlanes ` K ) $.
2lplnj.v $e |- V = ( LVols ` K ) $.
2lplnj $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( X e. P /\ Y e. P /\ W e. V ) /\ ( X .<_ W /\ Y .<_ W /\ X =/= Y ) ) -> ( X .\/ Y ) = W ) $.
